Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>If you need a <clr:0000>guide to the roads<clr:ffff> around
here, I can let you know what's what.
Talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Things have changed around here lately,
haven't they? Even the towns
are different.
There's been a lot of changes around
<clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>
in particular.
Talk_1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Do we protect the old or embrace
the new?

<sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff> seem
like they're at a major turning point.
Talk_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Kakariko Village is a Sheikah village
to the <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>.

It used to be a quiet town. That all
changed when <clr:0000>strange, ring-shaped
Zonai ruins<clr:ffff> fell from the sky.
Now it's crowded with both researchers
and tourists.
Talk_1050:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hateno Village is at the edge of Hyrule,
far to the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>.

It used to be known primarily for its <clr:0000>milk<clr:ffff>
and its <clr:0000>local produce<clr:ffff>.

Then, out of nowhere, a woman from the
clothes shop became a famous designer.

Now the town has become a <clr:0000>center
for fashion<clr:ffff>, of all things.
Talk_1060:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>If you're looking to do something special,
I recommend visiting Dueling Peaks'
stone statues.
There's no road up to the summit, so it's
no easy trek...

But the view of Hyrule at the top is a
true wonder.
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome to <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks Stable<clr:ffff>,
right at the foot of the <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks<clr:ffff>!

Thank you for returning to our stable.
We appreciate your business.

If you need a <clr:0000>guide to the roads<clr:ffff> around
here, I'm happy to help!
Talk_1031:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you're that interested, then you should
take a look!
Talk_1061:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>If you're up for a hard climb, I recommend
visiting Dueling Peaks' stone statues.

The view of Hyrule from up there is
something special!
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well, well, traveler. I'm glad you made it
here to <clr:0000>Dueling Peaks Stable<clr:ffff> despite the
bad weather.
Talk_1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>And that's not the half of it! Apparently
that ruin crumbled, and there was some
sort of big discovery.
Talk_1062:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>That said, I would wait until it stops
raining. The mountain will be too slippery
to climb safely.
Please feel free to relax at our inn until
the weather calms down.
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Well, well, traveler. Welcome to <clr:0000>Dueling
Peaks Stable<clr:ffff>, right at the foot of the
<clr:0000>Dueling Peaks<clr:ffff> themselves.
Near_0002: Want to rest for the night?
